description: This file appears to be a Python source file that defines functions for generating code related to RPC (Remote Procedure Call) emission, including event and method registration for a JSON-RPC framework. It includes functions for emitting function prototypes, registration, deregistration, and namespace handling, indicating that it's part of a code generation system for RPC services.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code for emitting an event handler function in C++, including handling parameters, conditions, and JSON serialization.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue section of the RPC code, including namespace and include directives.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the epilogue section of the RPC code, closing namespaces.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits version namespace code with major, minor, and patch version numbers.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function that generates the RPC registration code, including method registration, event handling, and namespace management.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Coordinates the emission of full RPC code, including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emits version-related code and manages the namespace and code generation for RPC versioning.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
